#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
const int N=1234567;
const int INF=(int)2e9;
 
int dp[N];
unordered_map<string, int> umap;
 
int main() {
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        int len=s.length();
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
            string x;
            cin>>x;
            umap[x]=1;
        }
        dp[len]=0;
        for(int i=len-1;i>=0;i--) {
            dp[i]=-1;
            string ss="";
            for(int j=i;j<len;j++) {
                ss.push_back(s[j]);
                if(umap[ss]) dp[i]=max(dp[i], dp[j+1]+1);
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n", dp[0]);
        umap.clear();
    }
}
